question: Today I experienced temporary paraysis in both my legs.  I stooped down to pick something up, I continued to the floor,  and I could not get up.  My legs had no strength and I could not stand for even with help for about ten minites. I am a 60 year old female with type 2 diabetes, high blood pressure, and scheduled to have a ct scan for a possible adrenal gland abnormality.
title: temporary parlisis in legs
